Descriptions + notes:

Controls:

- W,A,S,D for movement

- Left Shift for "dashing" (grants invincibilty for some time, can be let go early for shorter bursts)

- Left Click to shoot

- Press 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 to swap to each different weapon

Items:

Common:

Health Potion - Press 'G' to heal 15-30 hp

Soul Steel - Gives you more maxHP

Beans - Makes you move faster

Elite:

Armor-Piercing Rounds - Increases damage

Jar of Jelly - Increases reload time

Hasty Reagent - Increases fireRate

Back-Up Magazine - Grants you more maxAmmo

Legendary:

Jet Fuel - Increases your total dash length

Eye of Ra - Grants you a random chance to "crit" dealing extra damage

Invigorating Elixir - Increases potency of your Healing Potions

Mythical:

Fuel Array - Decreases dashCooldown

A Regular Screwdriver - For every 10 seconds of not taking damage nor standing still for a total of 3 seconds

                        gain a "screw" stack. For each screw stack you gain a 0.5 damage buff

Expired Medkit - heal for some portion of damage taken a couple seconds after taking damage
